Package jsky.graphics

Defines interfaces classes for working with graphics.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CanvasFigure This defines an abstract interface for figures drawn on a canvas.
CanvasFigureGroup This defines an abstract interface for a group of canvas figures that should be displayed and selected together as a unit.
CanvasFigureListener This defines the interface for listening for events on a canvas figure.
CanvasGraphics This defines an interface for drawing figures on a canvas of some type.
SelectedAreaListener This defines the interface for listening for area selection events.
 

Class Summary
CanvasFigureEvent This event is generated when a canvas figure is seletced, deselected, resized or dragged.
CanvasFigureListenerAdapter Adapter that does nothing, but implements the CanvasFigureListener interface.
CanvasFigureListenerManager Manages a list of listeners for events on a CanvasFigure.
 

Package jsky.graphics Description

Defines interfaces classes for working with graphics.
